Comment: Personally, I'm starting to wonder if he's our first quantum president. One who holds all possible positions on important topics at all times, popping out here and there into our reality to completely contradict himself. The inane utterances of his supporters follows the same logic: he's doing this but also that but also more than you think he is but also not at all what you think he is. You can't pin him or them down to any one take.  Every single headline that describes him needs to begin with "in a total contradiction to what he said/did a few minutes ago, a day ago, etc...." Hit us over the head with the inconsistency and the uncertainty it generates. That's what reflects his true nature, his superposition if you will.
